name: Yu-Gi-Oh! ONLINE 3 Deck File
summary: Learn about .Y3D files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Player Y3D files are saved to the My Documents\​Yu-Gi-Oh! ONLINE 3\​players\​ directory. Some preinstalled Y3D files are located in the \​data\​recipe\​ directory of the game installation.

description: Card deck file used by Yu-Gi-Oh! ONLINE 3: Duel Accelerator, an online digital card playing game; contains a deck of cards, or "recipe," that can be used for dueling against other players online; can be a custom user-made deck.
